import { Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import React from 'react' import street3 from '../image/street3.jpg'; function Contacto({ seccionAnimacion }) { const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = useState(window.innerWidth < 768); useEffect(() => { const handleResize = () => { setIsMobile(window.innerWidth < 768); }; window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize); return () => { window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize); }; }, []); return ( <>

 ) } export default Contacto;
